forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms this morning, mainly cloudy and windy during the afternoon with a few showers. High 18C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered thunderstorms this morning, mainly cloudy and windy during the afternoon with a few showers. High 63F. W winds at 10 to 15 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low around 45F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 21C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
